member.name: T:RoomManager.ConfigSettings
member.summary: Runs to establish configuration for this service. Does this vis-a-vis ApplicationPackageRoot/ApplicationManifest.xml

member.name: P:RoomManager.ConfigSettings.PlayerManagerName
member.summary: This reference is used by the stateful service controller in order to correctly route requests to the service.

member.name: P:RoomManager.ConfigSettings.ReverseProxyPort
member.summary: Called to dynamically get the correct port that related services will have open.

member.name: M:RoomManager.Program.Main
member.summary: This is the entry point of the service host process.

member.name: T:RoomManager.RoomManager
member.summary: The FabricRuntime creates an instance of this class for each service type instance.

member.name: M:RoomManager.RoomManager.CreateServiceReplicaListeners
member.summary: Optional override to create listeners (like tcp, http) for this service instance.
